verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to the Gittith. A Psalm of the sons of Korah. How <S%H3039>amiable<s%> are thy <S%H4908>tabernacles<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>!

My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3700>longeth<s%>, <S%H3615>yea<s%>, even fainteth for the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; My <S%H3820>heart<s%> and my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> cry <S%H7442>out<s%> unto the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>.

Yea <S%H6833><s%>, the sparrow hath <S%H4672>found<s%> her a <S%H1004>house<s%>, And the <S%H1866>swallow<s%> a <S%H7064>nest<s%> for <S%H7896>herself<s%>, where she may lay her <S%H667>young<s%>, Even thine <S%H4196>altars<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, My <S%H4428>King<s%>, and my <S%H430>God<s%>.
Blessed <S%H835><s%> are they that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in thy <S%H1004>house<s%>: They will be still <S%H1984>praising<s%> <S%H5542>thee<s%>. Selah
Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> whose <S%H5797>strength<s%> is in <S%H3824>thee<s%>; In whose heart are the highways to <S%H4546>Zion<s%>.

Passing <S%H5674><s%> through the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H1056>Weeping<s%> they <S%H7896>make<s%> it a place of <S%H4599>springs<s%>; <S%H4175>Yea<s%>, the early rain <S%H5844>covereth<s%> it with <S%H1293>blessings<s%>.
They <S%H3212>go<s%> from <S%H2428>strength<s%> to <S%H2428>strength<s%>; Every one of them <S%H7200>appeareth<s%> before <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.
O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer<s%>; Give <S%H238>ear<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
Behold <S%H7200><s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%> our <S%H4043>shield<s%>, And <S%H5027>look<s%> upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of thine <S%H4899>anointed<s%>.

For a <S%H3117>day<s%> in thy <S%H2691>courts<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than a <S%H505>thousand<s%>. I had <S%H977>rather<s%> be a <S%H5605>doorkeeper<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H430>God<s%>, Than to <S%H1752>dwell<s%> in the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>.

For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H8121>sun<s%> and a <S%H4043>shield<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> and <S%H3519>glory<s%>; No <S%H2896>good<s%> thing will he <S%H4513>withhold<s%> from them that <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H8549>uprightly<s%>.
O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> that trusteth in <S%H982>thee<s%>.
